eu.operando.core.cpcu.main

Class AbstractQuestionnaire

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.operando.core.cpcu.main.AbstractQuestionnaire
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActionQuestionnaire, DefaultQuestionnaire, ServiceQuestionnaire

    public abstract class AbstractQuestionnaire
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Questionnaire. Defines the base for a Questionnaire within the system. All classLoader classes (defined in Questionnaires.json) must extend this class.

      • AbstractQuestionnaire

        public AbstractQuestionnaire(java.lang.String type,
                             java.lang.Integer dependantOn,
                             DefaultDataProcessor processor,
                             java.lang.String metadata)
        Instantiates a new questionnaire.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the Questionnaire. This is used as the name of the Questionniare
        dependantOn - This identfies which questionnaire this questionnaire is dependant on (using internal ID).n
        processor - The processor used as the I/O for the Questionnaire.
        metadata - The metadata for the questionnaire.

    • Method Detail

      • getStatements

        public abstract java.lang.String getStatements(java.lang.Double noOfQuestions,
                                               int largestRatingValue,
                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> preferences)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets the statements to be used by the XForms Engine. There is several Stages of pre-processing in the later Questionnaires in order to generate useful Statements.
        Parameters:
        noOfQuestions - the no of questions
        largestRatingValue - the largest rating value of the questionnaire (used in questionnaire processing)
        Returns:
        the statements to be used by the XForms Engine.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • processResults

        public abstract java.util.Map<DataHolder,java.lang.Double> processResults(java.util.Map<Statement,java.lang.Double> results,
                                                                          int maxStatements,
                                                                          int largestRatingValue)
        Process results to Return the Preference values to be stored. This allows the Questionnaires to calculate the preferences differently according to the specification of the class. The Default Questionnaire only calculates a weighted average
        Parameters:
        results - the results, as a Map between Statement and result
        maxStatements - the max statements
        largestRatingValue - the largest rating value within the Questionnaire
